original_title: Alligator Alcatraz: Judge dismisses part of lawsuit over immigration detention center | CNN
article_summary: Federal Judge Rodolfo Ruiz issues a split decision on the legal rights of detainees at the "Alligator Alcatraz" immigration detention center in Florida's Everglades. The judge dismisses part of the suit and moves the case to a different jurisdiction, as the Trump administration designated the Krome North Processing Center as a site for their cases to be heard, making claims of lack of confidential access to lawyers and hearings in immigration court moot.</s>
